QuestData.Title: Did You Get The Note?
QuestData.Description: The cultist dropped this note, which apparently was to be delivered to Overseer Nuaar. It is signed by someone named Kolphis Darkscale.$B$BIt is likely that Tree Warden Chawn will be interested in looking at this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Meeting Note to Tree Warden Chawn at Evergrove in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: What's that you have there? Is that a blood stain on that note?
QuestData.RewardText: This is interesting, but disturbing. I wonder if Samia knows who this Kolphis Darkscale is?
